name: Multi Vision Foundation (MVF)
briefDescription: Multi Vision Foundation (MVF) is a National level organization involved in development sector since 1989. It has been formed by a group of young people from rural areas and initially registered as CHHINOLI GRAM SUDHAR SAMITI based out of Sonipat district of Haryana state. During the year 1989, it was realized to expand the operational areas from the point of view to bring more poor and needy people to the fold of programmes in other states. Therefore, it was agreed to change the name of the organization and its structure from state level to national level to spread in further geographies. As a result of the decision, the organization renamed to MULTI VISION FOUNDATION and registered in Delhi state as national level organization in 2000 unde
